channel.title: [Delta, 317] Major Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
channel.description:
Welcome MoparScape and RuneScape Private Server players, This is my post trying to solve a few things on my server, and i would appreciate it if you tried to help me in some way with at least one of my few problems I have.. Also I would love it if you don't flame over anyone of my questions just learning to code Delta's again, please And Thank You. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ [center][size=25pt][b][u]List Below[/u][/b][/size][/center]
[size=14pt]*I want to change my MODICON to a different one. *Adding A Name To Client.java That When You Login Your Source, With That Name You Will Auto Be Mod. *63 waves of jad. *Dragon claw special *Vista longsword special *Status hammer special *Dragonfire shield special *Player Killing(PK) system *Prayer system, not working at all, don't take away prayer points from prayer when in use, turmoil shuts off randomly *Adding customs, (Vista, Status, Zuriel, Morgans, Donor cape) *Giveitem Command, me and "usman555" Were working on this but, we keep failing it just wouldn't work. (::giveitem Bob 35 1)[/size] [size=7pt]Adding More As I Think Of Them...[/size] ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ Also if your going to post a reply saying "Use the search bar.." Or what ever, just give me a link, because I tried and only got this stuff for [PI] or I Couldn't understand what they meant. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ MIGHT BE ADDING MORE, KEEP LOOKING AGAIN! ___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

item.title: [Delta, 317] Major Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Kecea Kecea
item.description:
@Kecea wrote:

[quote=“Control Pride, post:4, topic:379456”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=475300.msg3475714#msg3475714 date=1295687360]
ok, i can help you with some of this. First for the name that need to log in to make it mod. search in your sources welcome to ****. the login message. under that put

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the name u want.")){ playerRights = 1; sM("what u want to tell him."); }
[/quote]No No No No, Like The Account Has NEVER Been Made Before, And When He Logs In He Is Already Staff…[/quote]That’s just what that snippet will do…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta, 317] Major Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“Abandoned Dreams, post:1, topic:379456”][size=14pt]*I want to change my MODICON to a different one.
*Adding A Name To Client.java That When You Login Your Source, With That Name You Will Auto Be Mod.
*63 waves of jad.
*Dragon claw special
*Vista longsword special
*Status hammer special
*Dragonfire shield special
*Player Killing(PK) system
*Prayer system, not working at all, don’t take away prayer points from prayer when in use, turmoil shuts off randomly
*Adding customs, (Vista, Status, Zuriel, Morgans, Donor cape)
*Giveitem Command, me and “usman555” Were working on this but, we keep failing it just wouldn’t work. (::giveitem Bob 35 1)[/size][/quote]

ok, i can help you with some of this. First for the name that need to log in to make it mod. search in your sources welcome to ****. the login message. under that put

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("the name u want.")){ playerRights = 1; sM("what u want to tell him."); }

ok that’s one thing now the next
adding customs: you should search for the models in the model section then add them to ur model source. Also there is a tut maded by silentcj i guess? he explain how to add models and let them work.

post any errors u have.

Read full topic

public void SpawnNewWave()
{

    if(TzWave == 1)
    {
    talk("Look out, here comes TzTok-Jad!", 2617);
        server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2745, 2400, 5083, heightLevel);
        NeededKills = 269;
}
}
public void healJad()
{
    for(int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++)
        if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null)
        {
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2745)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].heightLevel == heightLevel)
	{
	if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP < server.npcHandler.npcs[i].MaxHP)
	{
            server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP += 10;
	}
        }
}
}

}[/code]Does this help any? If not, sorry as you said “tried” and I did try xD!
I’ll look again for you man.

item.title: [Delta, 317] Major Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Welcome MoparScape and RuneScape Private Server players,
This is my post trying to solve a few things on my server, and i would appreciate it if you tried to help me in some way with at least one of my few problems I have… Also I would love it if you don’t flame over anyone of my questions just learning to code Delta’s again, please And Thank You.

[center][size=25pt]List Below[/size][/center]

[size=14pt]*I want to change my MODICON to a different one.
*Adding A Name To Client.java That When You Login Your Source, With That Name You Will Auto Be Mod.
*63 waves of jad.
*Dragon claw special
*Vista longsword special
*Status hammer special
*Dragonfire shield special
*Player Killing(PK) system
*Prayer system, not working at all, don’t take away prayer points from prayer when in use, turmoil shuts off randomly
*Adding customs, (Vista, Status, Zuriel, Morgans, Donor cape)
*Giveitem Command, me and “usman555” Were working on this but, we keep failing it just wouldn’t work. (::giveitem Bob 35 1)[/size]
[size=7pt]Adding More As I Think Of Them…[/size]

Also if your going to post a reply saying “Use the search bar…” Or what ever, just give me a link, because I tried and only got this stuff for [PI] or I Couldn’t understand what they meant.

MIGHT BE ADDING MORE, KEEP LOOKING AGAIN!
